衔接一代剧情，丰富了GlaDOS的整个形象，故事背景也完整了不少，解密也添加了很多新元素，真的非常优秀的作品啊。
（剧透警告）在中途听着GlaDOS的AI合成音不断说着各种不着边际又具有逻辑的话，说实话有点喜欢上了这个之前打的你死我活的机器人，也庆幸v社最后算是给了一个Happy Ending,另外提一句，结尾的歌真不错。
[spoiler] 往月球射那一枪真是太牛逼了... [/spoiler]我直呼好几个卧槽
wow the story is just incredible just wow buy this game it is sooooooo worth it it is a great experience just get the game man just wow

It's Portal. For my type of gaming, so far the series has been darn near perfect. Although the bot thing is really annoying ( I think he is supposed to be), it's still a great game.

10/10 - This game gave me lemons, but I didn’t make lemonade. I made the game take the lemons back! I got mad! I didn’t want their damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? I demanded to see the game's manager! Make this game rue the day it thought it could give me lemons! "Do you know who I am? I’m the man who’s gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I’m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!"
i like it, it very uwu poggers

Yes.

This is Valve's magnum opus. While the Half Life games were Valve's experimental tech demos, Portal was Valve going all out. This game is so widely loved and influential because it changed everything. The story is a perfect amalgamation of tongue in cheek humor and dark, infinitely mysterious secrets. The few characters this game has are all perfectly amazing and captivating. The music is beyond memorable and the gameplay is puzzle game perfection. I keep using the word perfect too much, but that's because I truly believe that Portal 2 is the closest to perfect out of all the games I've ever played. 10/10
Vamos, es portal, es perfecto
Yes.
wait you dont own it already?
i liked the part when i used portals

The Portal games are unlike any other kind of game out there. I think of it as a 'Cognitive Gauntlet', because you have to think your way around, and out. In "Portal 2", there are also so many user-created add-on's, that the game never has to end. In fact there is even an add-on now that is called "Cognitive Gauntlet". The  best part is, once you start playing, you'll never want it to end anyway. This is the only game where you are given a gun, but you are never expected to shoot anyone, because it makes portals instead of wounds or death.
    Out of all the games I have ever played, Portal 2 is at the very top place as my all-time favorite. My second all time favorite game is "The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim".
    I highly recommend Portal 2 to anyone who loves thinking things through, and solving puzzles.

To tytuł zrobiony za duże pieniądze, ale jednocześnie na tyle interesujący i oryginalny, że możemy mówić o zupełnie nowej jakości. Naprawdę. Znane z „jedynki” komory nie przypominają już sterylnych pomieszczeń laboratoryjnych. Fabuła gry zawiązuje się tuż po wydarzeniach, których świadkami byliśmy w części pierwszej
